description: Validates a Device Defender security profile behaviors specification. Requires permission to access the ValidateSecurityProfileBehaviors action.

nested_items.name: valid
nested_items.description: True if the behaviors were valid.

nested_items.name: validationErrors
nested_items.description: The list of any errors found in the behaviors.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The description of an error found in the behaviors.
